ns2:study.shortTitle: Phase II Trial of Flavopiridol and Cisplatin in Advanced Epithelial Ovarian and Primary Peritoneal Carcinomas smpl 2

ns2:organization.name: University of Wisconsin Hospital and Clinics

ns2:treatmentAssignment.description: (Cycle= 3 Weeks): Cisplatin 60 mg/m2 IV on day 1 Flavopiridol 100 mg/m2 CIV over 24 hours on day 1

ns2:evaluationPeriod.name: Treatment
ns2:evaluationPeriod.descriptionText: Enter all Pain adverse events that present.
